name: Momento
headline: Building a full-stack auto insurer for the underserved in LatAm
description:
In Momento we are going through a challenging regulatory process to become a fully-licensed insurance carrier. By doing so, we will be able to underwrite risk, set prices and, ultimately, become owners of the product.

Once approved, around summer 22, we will be in a great position to size the $13bn untapped opportunity of +30 Mn uninsured vehicles – just in Mexico! As we will be able to attack the main pain points in the market: i) antiquated underwriting models and ii) payment conditions only adapted for the affluent.

To succeed, we have assembled an elite team with both innovative and experienced profiles. We are three cofounders, two ex-McKinsey and one ex-P&G, and we managed to attract two heavyweights of the Mexican insurance industry: the previous CUO of Zurich Mexico and the previous CFO and VP of Finance of ING and AXA Mexico.

founders.name: Lois Rogel Vence, Founder
founders.description:
Lois is co-founder at Momento.
Prior to founding Momento, Lois was Associate at McKinsey & Company, where he worked for +3 years. During his tenure at McKinsey, Lois focused on serving Financial Institutions and Private Equity funds across Europe and the US.
Lois is an alumnus of ICADE (Universidad Pontificia de Comillas) where he studied Law and Business Administration.

founders.name: León Bartolomé Carreño, Founder
founders.description:
León is co-founder at Momento.
Prior to founding Momento, León was an Associate at McKinsey & Company, where he worked for 3 years. During his tenure at McKinsey, León focused on strategy projects in insurance companies and private equity funds as well as in operations improvement projects across industries.
León is an alumnus of Imperial College London where he studied Mechanical Engineering (Master's level).

founders.name: Andrés Guerrero Álvarez, Founder
founders.description: Andrés is Co-Founder at Momento. Prior to founding Momento, Andrés was e-Business Manager at P&G for 3 years, focusing con marketing and distributing FMCG products in the online channel. Andrés is an alumnus of Imperial College  (BA), Warwick Business School (MA) and Carlos III University of Madrid (MA).

generated_description:
**Momento: Innovating Auto Insurance for Latin America**

Founded in 2021 and based in Mexico City, Momento is a fresh entrant in the auto insurance sector, aiming to revolutionize how insurance is offered in Latin America. With a mission to develop a full-stack auto insurer, they specifically target the significantly underserved market of over 30 million uninsured vehicles in Mexico, tapping into a $13 billion industry opportunity.

Just over a year into their journey, Momento has navigated a demanding regulatory process and has received approval to become a fully licensed insurance carrier. This status empowers them to underwrite risk and set prices, establishing their stake in the marketplace. The company combines the expertise of its three co-founders—two hailing from McKinsey and one from Procter & Gamble—with seasoned veterans from leading Mexican insurance firms, including former executives from Zurich and AXA.

Momento operates with a team of 18 dedicated professionals and prides itself on leveraging advanced technology, particularly machine learning, to deliver insurance products tailored for the everyday customer. Their approach seeks to address the pain points of traditional insurers, focusing on outdated underwriting methods and payment plans that often exclude those who cannot afford them.

Their offerings are designed with flexibility in mind—customers can choose to pay monthly, quarterly, or annually, ensuring that financial access isn't a barrier to obtaining vital auto insurance coverage. The platform is entirely digital, allowing users to manage their policies, report incidents, and seek assistance seamlessly through an app or their website.

At its core, Momento is about transparency and innovation in insurance. They promise a straightforward experience devoid of the convoluted fine print and complications that often accompany traditional policies. Instead, they use AI to generate customized rates based on a comprehensive understanding of each customer’s risk profile, making the process tailored and fair.

Backed by renowned investors from Y Combinator and Foundation Capital, Momento is positioned to transform auto insurance in Mexico, making it accessible and user-friendly.

For more about Momento and to get a quote, you can visit their website [here](https://www.tumomento.com). 

In summary, Momento is not just selling insurance; they’re selling peace of mind, accessibility, and a modern approach to a field that’s long overdue for disruption.
